metadata.title: CVE-2015-6612 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: libmedia in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48X and 6.0 before 2015-11-01 allowsattackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug23540426.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
